title: Google Meet "Camera is Starting"
content: Hello, after a week of using my camera before the update on firefox it was fine. After the update I haven't used it much but when I tried to test my camera in Google Meet 3 days before a meeting it keeps saying Camera is Starting. I don't want to use other browsers because it runs slow on my computer, is there any fix to this? Need help ASAP.
creator: magerhux

title: Cannot connect Youtube.com and Goole.com
content:
Since yesterday, When I try to connect to YouTube and google, following error is displayed.

Did Not Connect: Potential Security Issue

I did some research and changed the about:config security.enterprise_roots. setting to enabled and Issue was fixed. But YouTube freezes when the setting is in the above mentioned state. I tried refreshing, reinstalling, remove and re instilling this far. A help is much appreciated. Thanks in Advance.
creator: thadithasamarakoon

title: YouTube has suddenly stopped functioning properly in Firefox.
content:
Fellow Firefox users, here is my problem:

Until yesterday (6/28/21), YouTube worked with no problems in Firefox. All of a sudden, YouTube does not function properly in Firefox. Videos will start, and within about two minutes, the video freezes and the spinning circle comes up. YouTube functions fine in Microsoft Edge. I have tried to reset everything, but it doesn't make a difference--YouTube isn't functioning as it should on this computer. I had a Microsoft Windows update on this computer in the last few days, but I don't think it is that because it was working after those downloaded. What should I do?
creator: rvdvance

title: copying firefox data
content: Hi,Please assist I have my windows 10 Desktop Computer for which I use 95% of the Time,I also Have a Windows 10 Laptop Computer How Can I Copy all the Data from Forefox on my Desktop Computer to my Laptop Computer & can I copy over the Data in the Laptop this will include all Book marks Thank you Darryl
creator: dasmit

title: How can I change the context menu color?
content:
Greetings, my name is Sandy Stone. I have a question, I made my custom theme in Firefox Color, but I would like to know how can I change the context menu background color, because it doesn't fits with my theme.

Sincerely, Sandy Stone.
creator: Sandessat

title: Firefox not opening new windows
content: Firefox is my default browser, and has been for a long time. Recently clicking on hyperlinks didn't lead to a new window opening, but they do when i make chrome/edge the default browser. Also, when i right click the firefox icon in my taskbar, and click on open new window, a new window doesn't open. i need to drag a tab off screen to create new windows. this is frustrating, and i might need to stop using firefox until it's fixed. please let me know if this is something i can fix on my end, but it seems like a software issue to me
creator: amthomas215

title: Idiome
content: Quando faço pesquisa no navegador da Fiferox utilizando a extensão alguns sites cuja versão original são em inglês eles não convertem para o português. Um exemplo é o caso do site da Anchor.fm. No entanto se utilizo o mesmo site da Anchor.fm no navegador Edje da Microsoft a conversão para o português é automática. Minha pergunta: o que pode estar impedindo a conversão para o português quando utilizo o navegador Firefox, uma vez que ele está configurado para o idioma em português? Extensões de segurança para navegação impedem a conversão para o idioma português ao usar o navegador Firefox?
creator: redacaoenempassoapasso
